summary: Adds skulls and assorted trophy items to various creatures and enemies in the game.
descriptionHtml:
I like skulls and I like collecting skulls, so I made this mod.

[b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Mod description:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
This allows you to loot skulls and similar items from certain creatures and enemies in the game.

[u]Items added[/u]
[list]
[*]Deer skulls with antlers and without antlers. Dropped by elk and deer.
[*]Frost Giant Skulls dropped by frost Giants in the Dawnguard DLC. This should also work with frost giants added by other mods.
[*]Goat heads dropped by goats.
[*]Hagraven heads dropped by hagravens. (Added in V2) They can now be boiled at a cooking pot allowing you to turn them into skulls.
[*]Skeever heads dropped by skeevers.
[*]Werewolf heads dropped by werewolves. There are 3 variants to the werewolf heads.
[*]Trolls will now drop troll skulls.
[*](Added in V2) Argonians will now drop argonian skulls.
[*](Added in V2) Khajiit will now drop Khajiit skulls.
[*](Added in V2) Orcs will now drop orc skulls.
[*](Added in V2) Humans and elves will now drop vanilla skulls.
[*](Added in V2) All NPCs will now drop spines.
[/list]
[b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Updates:[/size][/color][/u][/b]
V2 added two new files one complete with everything including NPC skulls and the other being an updated version of the old version with no skulls added to NPCS.

[b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Things to note:
[/size][/color][/u][/b]Unfortunately the werewolf heads are static when dropped due to requiring havok animations and me not having the skill, or know-how to add those. If anyone would like to assist me by adding havok to the heads then I'd much appreciate it.

[b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]Requirements:
[/size][/color][/u][/b]This requires both the Dawnguard and Dragonborn DLC due to the Frost Giant skull.

[color=#6fa8dc][size=5][b][u]Reccomended mods:[/u][/b][/size][/color]
This mod goes well with Roland's excellent [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24543/?]Predators - The Lost Tribes[/url][/b] mod. Check it out if you're a fan of Predator.

I also recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57335/?]Jaxonz Renamer[/url] that will allow you to name the individual skulls you get so that you can tell the difference between certain skulls.
[b][u][b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=5]
Credits:[/size][/color][/u][/b][/u][/b]
Big thanks to PROMETHEUS_ts for allowing me use of the argonian, khajiit, and orc skulls in their excellent [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28957/?]Beast Skeletons[/url] mod. Check it out.
author: DimensionLord1
